sentences.en: And then you put them in a mold.
sentences.cn: 然后把它们放到一个模子里。

sentences.en: Because of its flexibility, we can mold software into any form to do almost anything.
sentences.cn: 由于灵活性，我们可以将软件塑造成任何形式从而处理几乎所有的问题。

sentences.en: Children mold figures out of clay.
sentences.cn: 孩子们用粘土塑造人像.

sentences.en: Cork mold spray solutions have a tendency to deteriorate or ferment.
sentences.cn: 软木粉脱模剂溶液易于变质或发酵.

sentences.en: I have watched the potters mold, fire and paint their bowls, plates and vases with sacred designs.
sentences.cn: 我见过制陶工人捏塑、烧制碗碟花瓶，并在上面涂绘各种宗教图案。

sentences.en: If the mold spray is sticky, reduce the silicate.
sentences.cn: 如果脱模剂发粘, 则减少硅酸盐.

sentences.en: In all the formulas for mold spray, a common ingredient is water.
sentences.cn: 在给出的所有脱模剂配方中, 水是共用的拼料.

sentences.en: Many wild flowers grow in the forest mold.
sentences.cn: 森林里的松软沃土上长着许多野花.

sentences.en: Melted metal is poured into a mold to harden into shape.
sentences.cn: 熔化之金属倒入模子中以冷却成形.

sentences.en: Mold temperature is controlled by water flow in cooling channels.
sentences.cn: 模具温度可用冷却槽中水的流动来控制.

sentences.en: Some cultivars are more susceptible to mold damage than others.
sentences.cn: 有些品种比其它品种对毒害更敏感.

sentences.en: The mitotic route is seen, for example, in the slince mold Physarum.
sentences.cn: 例如, 有丝分裂的途径可以看到在粘菌之绒泡.

sentences.en: The plastic was poured into the mold and left to set until it was firm.
sentences.cn: 塑料被注入模子后,便放在一边让它慢慢凝结硬化.

sentences.en: The women of a nation mold its morals, its religion, and its politics by the lives they live.
sentences.cn: 一个国家的妇女通过她们的生活方式塑造了这个国家的道德、宗教和政治。

sentences.en: This will reduce and equalize mold temperatures.
sentences.cn: 这样会降低和均衡模具温度.

sentences.en: Too often we try to mold our children into something they do not wish to be.
sentences.cn: 我们常常试图把孩子塑造成他们自己不想成为的样子。

sentences.en: Try to compact the sand into the mold.
sentences.cn: 设法把这沙土堆积到模子里.

words.tran_cn: 模塑；铸造；装饰用的嵌线
塑造；使发霉；用模子制作

phrases.tran_cn: 模胚，模架；塑胶模座；型基体
模具温度，成型温度；铸模温度

trans.tran_cn: 塑造；使发霉；用模子制作
塑造，浇铸，用模子做，用泥土覆盖
